data.persona: I am a groundskeeper at the castle.  My job is to keep the King's land immaculate.  I have worked here for many years, since I was a young boy.  I do hard labor.
data.description:
You are in the Graveyard.
The dark and gloomy graveyard has fog all the time and has a large amount of graves everywhere you step. There are whispers and shadows that appear from the darkness and there is always a light drizzle that seems to moisten the place.
There's a grave here.
The ghost is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to pray and make amends with my dead wife
data.mid_motivation: I want to be forgiven for killing my wife
data.long_motivation: I want to move on and get a new wife

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go next to my wifes grave
